oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: CIMMYT, Int.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Zea mays

oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This non-technical annual report is intended primarily for policymakers and members of the donor community. It contains a concise presentation of CIMMYT's research programs in Maize, Wheat, and Economics, as well as a review of special projects and a financial statement. The Annual Report is supplemented by the Research Highlights and the Technical Biennial Reports on Maize and Wheat Improvement
